comments.body: really?  I thought we already had this.
Today, the best way to generate the openapi is to run an apiserver and get `/openapi/v2` (which is what we do in `hack/update-openapi-spec.sh`).

`swagger.json` is a downstream artifact of this that combines this information with endpoint information to construct the complete OpenAPI.  This artifact only has information about the `definitions` (the types, not the endpoints). The problem is that depending directly on `swagger.json` introduces a dependency cycle. I put a section in the description summarizing.
